Question: IAI Smart Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
IAI Smart Inc

Emerson All-in-One Portable Video Conferencing System

 - Awarded CES® 2024 Innovation Award
 - Recognized in the "Content & Entertainment" category
 - Compatible with major ecosystems (Google Home, Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, etc.)
 - Integrates artificial intelligence for smart home applications
 - Sales collaboration with IAI Smart Inc
Summary_cn:
IAI智能公司

埃默森一体化便携式视频会议系统

- 获得CES® 2024创新奖
- 在“内容与娱乐”类别中受到认可
- 兼容主要生态系统（谷歌家庭、亚马逊Alexa、苹果HomeKit等）
- 集成人工智能用于智能家居应用
- 与IAI智能公司进行销售合作
